title: Along the road (Thailand)
creator_credit: Soerabaia Pictures and South Australian Film Corporation
brief_description: Shows a road built by Australians in Thailand and the ways in which it is used for communication, trading and travel, by farmers, traders, foresters and families. Suitable for middle-upper Primary School. No other credits available.
